mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart ( user_id, product_id, quantity ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{productId}, IFNULL(#{quantity}, 1) )ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE quantity = quantity + IFNULL(#{quantity}, 1);
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity, create_date, modify_date FROM cart WHERE product_id=#{productId} AND user_id=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE user_id=#{userId}

SELECT c.product_id, p.name as productName, p.description as description, p.use_yn as productUseYn, c.quantity, p.price, CONCAT(f.file_id, '.', f.file_type) AS imageUrl, c.create_date FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON c.product_id=p.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN file f ON c.product_id=f.reference_id AND f.reference_type='PRODUCT_IMG' AND f.use_yn='Y' WHERE user_id=#{userId}
